subject: Concussions
College Athletics
Sports Medicine
lead_paragraph: Most colleges in the N.C.A.A. have team physicians or trainers at games, but the N.C.A.A. has no rules on how each member should manage concussions.
snippet: Most colleges in the N.C.A.A. have team physicians or trainers at games, but the N.C.A.A. has no rules on how each member should manage concussions.
